attributes.action: 21st June to be a bank holiday
attributes.additional_details: The good people of the UK have had a year of their lives stolen. Give us time to celebrate and rejoice the reunion of family, friends, socialising, employment, better mental health and all other good things that the end of lockdown will bring.
attributes.background: One off bank holiday to represent freedom of movement to see family and friends.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
